Pre-Game Insights: India will be keen to close out the tournament with a win over Afghanistan, who are also in the same boat as the Indians.
Although they will start as underdogs, Afghan's bowling attack, led by Rashid Khan, should make for a riveting contest in Dubai.
Left-arm pace has been India's kryptonite in recent matches.
India also have a reliable left-arm pacer in Arshdeep Singh, who could prove to be a handful for the Afghan top order in the IND vs AFG game.
India's struggles against spin could make Rashid Khan a brilliant captaincy option for your IND vs AFG Dream11 fantasy team.
Rohit Sharma has a record against Afghanistan (two innings, 75 runs, strike rate of 156.25), making him a good pick as captain or vice-captain.
Suryakumar Yadav has looked in good touch, striking at 160.24, and should be a top pick against Afghanistan's spin-heavy bowling attack.
Hardik Pandya is India's most impactful player in the format, given his all-round skills, and should be a must-have in your IND vs AFG Dream11 fantasy team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch in Dubai is a good one to bat on, with the last three matches here seeing first-innings scores of 175, 181, and 173, all of which were chased down as well.
Chasing has been the norm at the venue and will be the preferred choice yet again.
Spin will have a say in the outcome of the match, with the previous game seeing 41 percent of the wickets being taken by the spinners.
The average 1st-innings score is 166, and the average 2nd-innings score is 158.
Matches won by teams batting first: 1, and matches won by teams bowling first: 5.
Rahmanullah Gurbaz has been the go-to player for Afghanistan, scoring 135 runs in three matches at the time of writing.
Virat Kohli has scores of 154 runs in 4 matches.
Rohit Sharma has scores of 133 runs in 4 matches.
Rashid Khan has 4 wickets in 3 matches.
Fazalhaq Farooqi has 3 wickets in 3 matches.
Others: India probable playing 11: Rohit Sharma (c), KL Rahul, Virat Kohli, Suryakumar Yadav, Hardik Pandya, Rishabh Pant (wk), Deepak Hooda/Dinesh Karthik, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Arshdeep Singh, Ravichandran Ashwin and Yuzvendra Chahal.

Afghanistan probable playing 11: Hazratullah Zazai, Rahmanullah Gurbaz (wk), Ibrahim Zadran, Najibullah Zadran, Mohammad Nabi (c), Karim Janat, Samiullah Shenwari, Rashid Khan, Naveen-ul-Haq, Mujeeb ur Rahman and Fazalhaq Farooqi.
IND vs AFG match captain and vice-captain choices: Rashid Khan and Rohit Sharma.
IND vs AFG Dream11 match top picks: Rahmanullah Gurbaz, Suryakumar Yadav, Hardik Pandya, Rashid Khan, and Fazalhaq Farooqi.
